attributes.action: Help make lacrosse, both men's and women's, an Olympic sport.
attributes.background: As a lacrosse player, having been involved in English lacrosse, I was disappointed to hear that the World Cup was not covered by any broadcaster. Lacrosse is a popular sport with both males and females and should be involved in the Olympic Games.

rejection.details:
The decision about which sports are in the Olympics is made by the International Olympic Committee (IOC). You can find out more about the IOC here:

http://www.olympic.org/ioc
